about.summary: pytest plugin with mechanisms for caching across test runs

name: pytest-cache
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "pytest-cache" %}
{% set version = "1.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "be7468edd4d3d83f1e844959fd6e3fd28e77a481440a7118d430130ea31b07a9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - pytest >=2.2
    - execnet >=1.1.dev1

test:
  imports:
    - pytest_cache

about:
  home: http://bitbucket.org/hpk42/pytest-cache
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'pytest plugin with mechanisms for caching across test runs'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bjodah
